modules.description: Generates random values based on specified types and shrinks them to minimal counterexamples when test failures occur. It supports custom generator creation using a monad-like interface, enabling precise control over value distribution. Used to validate invariants in complex data transformations and algorithm behaviors.

Generates structure items for type and module type declarations based on provided context and AST nodes. Operates on OCaml AST types such as type_declaration, module_type_declaration, and rec_flag. Used to automatically expand ppx syntax into concrete type and module definitions during compilation.
